SwitchPreference.android:title: Wifi Hack
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOn: Wifi will be disabled if there is a timeout (poor wifi signal/access point), this will allow mobile data to be used instead
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOff: The uploader won't try to disable Wifi even if there is a timeout

SwitchPreference.android:title: 2 Days at Startup
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOn: When the upload application first starts it will upload ~2.5 days of data
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOff: The uploader won't try upload old data
